name: We Are Out of Food, Milton.
name_original: We Are Out of Food, Milton.
description:
"You run out of food pretty often, and each time Dandy reacts worse and worse. You suppose if you didn't have to do something about it in his place, you'd probably be feeling like this as well."

"WE ARE OUT OF FOOD, MILTON." is a visual novel/walking sim about having to go to the grocery store even though you really don't want to.

The game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete.

Made in RPGMaker VX Ace in somewhere around one to two weeks, if you cut out all the time I spent not working on it.

This game is intended to have a sort of tense atmosphere but I wouldn't really consider it to be a horror game, so if you're looking for something scary you should probably look elsewhere.

There's one ending and no real gameplay, just keep on going until it ends.


CONTROLS
Arrow Keys
MoveShiftRunSpaceInteract, Select
XCancel, Open Menu
Alt + Enter
Fullscreen
